controls.title: Physical devices and systems inventory
controls.description: Physical devices and systems within the organization are inventoried
controls.evidence: Asset inventory system (ServiceNow), quarterly reconciliation reports

controls.title: Software platforms and applications inventory
controls.description: Software platforms and applications within the organization are inventoried
controls.evidence: Partial CMDB coverage, shadow IT discovery in progress

controls.title: Asset vulnerabilities are identified
controls.description: Asset vulnerabilities are identified and documented

controls.title: Threats and vulnerabilities are used to determine risk
controls.description: Threats, vulnerabilities, likelihoods, and impacts are used to determine risk

controls.title: Identities and credentials managed
controls.description: Identities and credentials are issued, managed, verified, revoked, and audited
controls.evidence: IAM system (Okta), access reviews, termination procedures

controls.title: Access permissions managed
controls.description: Access permissions and authorizations are managed using least privilege and separation of duties
controls.notes: Separation of duties not fully enforced in legacy systems

controls.title: Data-at-rest protection
controls.evidence: Database encryption enabled, laptop FDE deployed
controls.notes: File server encryption pending budget approval

controls.title: Data-in-transit protection
controls.evidence: TLS 1.2+ enforced, VPN for remote access

controls.title: Vulnerability management plan
controls.description: A vulnerability management plan is developed and implemented
controls.evidence: VM policy document, patching procedures, SLA tracking

controls.title: Detected events analyzed
controls.description: Detected events are analyzed to understand attack targets and methods

controls.title: Network monitoring
controls.description: The network is monitored to detect potential cybersecurity events

controls.title: Incident response plan executed
controls.description: Response plan is executed during or after an incident
controls.evidence: IR plan documented, tabletop exercises planned

controls.title: Personnel know their roles
controls.description: Personnel know their roles and order of operations when a response is needed
controls.notes: IR roles not formally documented or communicated

controls.title: Recovery plan executed
controls.description: Recovery plan is executed during or after a cybersecurity incident
controls.evidence: DR plan exists, backup procedures documented

controls.title: Recovery activities communicated
controls.description: Recovery activities are communicated to internal and external stakeholders
